__TOC__

This page is for the Website Team to document data for maintaining the web site.
== Wordpress ==

* Standard Wordpress install
* light-wordpress-theme is bzr branched directly in the wp-content/themes/ directory
** There was one modification to remove search, which has been reverted
* light-disable-search plugin
** See https://code.launchpad.net/~ubuntu-california-website/ubuntu-california-website/light-disable-search

== Planet ==

* Standard Planet venus install
* Installed via git checkout into venus directory
* california.ini contains all settings
* /etc/crontab updated to update planet every :42

== DNS ==

* erichammond has A records setup to point to linode for ubuntu-california.org and www
* erichammond has redirects setup on ubuntu-california.com, ubuntucalifornia.org, and ubuntucalifornia.com
* grantbow has redirect setup on ubuntu-us-ca.org
